title: Receive error when player requires Optional Waivers
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is creating an Optional Assignment for a player who needs Waivers
custom_steps: WHEN user selects Create New > Assignment > Optional Assignment
custom_expected: THEN error is displayed "Optional assignment waivers must be in effect for this assignment"

title: Player can create Optional Assignment for player w/o receiving error if specific Criteria is met
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is creating an Optional Assignment for a player
AND one of the 4 criteria is met
custom_steps:
WHEN user Creates New > Assignment > Optional Assignment
AND/OR player has 4th option
AND/OR player has a Recall in the last 2 days and 'recall of 26th man' checkbox is checked
AND/OR player has an outright trade effective today or yesterday and was on option prior to trade or was designated from option prior to trade
AND/OR the assignment date is before the 'waivers required for option' date (in player profile)
custom_expected:
THEN no error is displayed 
AND user can successfully submit an Optional Assignment for player
